Articles.Content: Hi every one i've been playing ksp since 0.15.1 and have been visiting the forum ever since. I have been enjoying the game very, very much And if you don't mind could you please give me some help using the forum thanks.
Hello, Silver Eagle, welcome to the forums!

Welcome to the community Silver Eagle

What in particular about the forums would you like to know? Just ask and we'll try our best to help you

Thanks guys as I said I've been playing ksp since 0.15.1 and have been reading the forum (and I loved every minute of it) ever since but never joined till now and I hope to be part of a strong ksp community and contribute as much as I can to the community. I herd about the great forum wipe/kraken attack/the incident/Jeb blowing up the servers/Ddoss attack and I really fell sorry for all of you guys who lost your accounts or posts an threads. I think I just might do something of Jeb blowing up the servers:wink:

Any way I would like to say thanks to the dev's for this AMAZING game and I hope that the community stays strong and helpful.
